channel.title: Argon Test version
channel.description:
[CENTER] [img]http://puu.sh/d9ax8/a2035c3667.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://www.argonrsps.com"][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52228169/Website-image-big.gif[/img][/URL]
This is meant for people who has been following Argon's project thread and wants to[B] test some basic stuff[/B] out, this isn't still [B]not public yet[/B]. Please understand that[B] there is bugs and the server isn't complete[/B].
[B]Currently you can use the following commands[/B] ::item id amount ::master ::itemname name
[COLOR="#DAA520"][B]Website[/B][/COLOR]: [url=http://www.argonrsps.com/landing/]Argon | Landing[/url] [COLOR="#DAA520"][B]Forum[/B][/COLOR]: [url=http://www.argonrsps.com/forum/]Argon - Unreal Portal[/url] [COLOR="#DAA520"][B]Client download[/B][/COLOR]: [url=http://www.argonrsps.com/forum/index.php?/topic/39-argon-official-client/]Argon Official Client - Server Announcements - Argon[/url]
[B][COLOR="#DAA520"]Content[/COLOR][/B] -Bounty Hunter -Nightmare zone -Miniquest system -Flawless combat system -Random events -Sounds & Music -Boss pets -OSRS items & bosses -Perk System *And so on...
[B][COLOR="#DAA520"]Media[/COLOR][/B]
[img]http://puu.sh/cZoRd/b0b93555e4.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/d1a8Z/d88a1a955d.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/d1sdy/67b8819e5d.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/d07Vx/863c6ac35e.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/d69eX/59d055c683.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/diidb/01672b2f3e.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/dfC8t/e87af3fdd9.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/dgBx3/344dcf5667.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/djb8a/2c4a8c0a0a.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/d07QS/cc60562402.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cZlZA/262645639c.png[/img][/CENTER]

[CENTER]

[URL=http://“http://www.argonrsps.com”][/URL]

This is meant for people who has been following Argon’s project thread and wants to[B] test some basic stuff[/B] out, this isn’t still [B]not public yet[/B]. Please understand that[B] there is bugs and the server isn’t complete[/B].

[B]Currently you can use the following commands[/B]
::item id amount
::master
::itemname name
